review: Not as much content as I'd hoped, ie..target ticket.  But, great for travel, playroom, etc.  Small, works great.
author: Julio wu

review: I was really excited to find a mid range priced item to watch Hulu and Netflix. The fire stick was great for about two weeks, but then it changed. It will not play some episodes, and it will lock up pretty frequently. I have updated the stick, and my internet is solid, so it's definitley the stick.  I own an Apple TV, and really hoped that the Fire stick would change my mind about a mid priced media hub. Maybe I purchased a bad stick, but regardless, I'm really not impressed.  More frustrated than happy.
author: scott kammer

review: A must have for Amazon Prime Members! It's so easy, plug it in and you're done. I have an Amazon Fire TV app on my phone so I can say what I am searching for or use the remote to type it in. I love this Fire Stick.... I can watch all my purchased movies as well as all the Prime movies.... I am so glad my kid's talked me into buying this, don't hesitate... It's a great buy :)
author: sherri

review: Misleading again, thought it had access to free TV and movies, but NO! It makes you sign up to Amazon Prime and Netflix for anything that's worth watching. Returning it!
author: Drewslist

review: Works as described- and very affordable also!
author: Laura1876

review: i just love amazons products because they are trustable
author: ADEEL MAJEED

review: I love it! I don't have a game console for my Netflix or Amazon prime network so the fire tv stick is a hit.
author: Cynthia D Eriks
